record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - September 07, 2007)

[Page: S11271]

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that Ann Clough, a detailee in my office, be granted the privilege of the floor for the remainder of the debate on the conference report for H.R. 2669, the College Cost Reduction and Access Act.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Lily Clark, a fellow in my office, be granted the privilege of the floor for the remainder of this session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
